text: An injury made Ross miss the semi-finals  "I can recover & play in the finals"
Ross doesn't dwell on the past
Chris lost his job after an economic downturn  "I can get hired again"
Chris has hope for his future
Grandfather John feels old watching young people in the park  "I helped create this community"
John is proud of his contributions and doesn't let age weigh him down
Nick felt isolated after hearing about a weekend party  "I can invite and host friends for an event"
Nick realizes he can create his own social opportunities
Julian lost interest in knitting after discouragement  "My happiness in pursuing a hobby is important"
Julian knows not everyone's opinions matter and doesn't let it drag her down
Jake has been experiencing fatigue after a family member's death  "I am allowed to grieve"
Jake understands that death is normal and gives himself time to process grief
Ava withdrew from friends and family after a traumatic accident  "My friends and family are not at fault for the accident"
Ava realizes accidents happen and allows herself to forgive others
Mary began avoiding people because she didn't feel safe  "I will be fine; nobody is out there to get me"
Mary realizes her fear is unwarranted and nobody is trying to harm her
